spec_data.Name: perl-Perl-Critic-Itch
spec_data.Description:
Perl::Critic::Itch was created to fulfill some special requests when analyzing
Perl Code. This policies, may not be useful to everyone, and surely not
consensual, but they solve some little itches I had, and it makes me sleep
better at night!
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:02:50 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Collection of Perl::Critic policies to solve some itches
